string.description: a11y string to indicate this button moves the calendar to the next month [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_a11y_next_month

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button moves the calendar to the previous month [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_a11y_prev_month

string.description: a11y string read on selection change to indicate the new selection [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_announce_current_selection

string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will ignore the user's selection [CHAR_LIMIT=16]
string.name: mtrl_picker_cancel

string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will save the user's selection [CHAR_LIMIT=16]
string.name: mtrl_picker_confirm

string.description: A single date [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_selected

string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking a date within the calendar [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_title

string.description: Placeholder for a single date [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_unselected

string.description: a11y string to indicate this is a header for a column of days for one day of the week (e.g., Monday) [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_day_of_week_column_header

string.description: Indicates that the user entered date cannot be parsed because its format is wrong. [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format

string.description: Tells a user what an example valid entry looks like. [CHAR_LIMIT=18]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format_example

string.description: Tells a user what format is expected for their date entry. [CHAR_LIMIT=18]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format_use

string.description: Notifies the user that the two entered dates do not represent a valid range of dates [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_range

string.description: a11y string that informs the user that tapping this button will switch the year [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_navigate_to_year_description

string.description: Notifies the user that the entered date is outside the allowed range [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_out_of_range

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range where end date has been selected [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_only_end_selected

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range where start date has been selected [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_only_start_selected

string.description: Two dates separated by a dash representing a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_selected

string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking dates within the calendar to form a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_title

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_unselected

string.description: Confirms the selection [CHAR_LIMIT=12]
string.name: mtrl_picker_save

string.description: Label for a single date selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_hint

string.description: Label for the end date in a range selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_range_end_hint

string.description: Label for the start date in a range selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_range_start_hint

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for day. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=1]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_day_abbr

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for month. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=1]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_month_abbr

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for year. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=1]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_year_abbr

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button changes the input mode to a calendar [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_calendar_input_mode

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button switches the user to choosing a day [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_day_selection

resources.string: Tap to switch to selecting a day
